name: Into the Woods
description: Into the Woods is a modern twist on the beloved Brothers Grimm fairy tales in a musical format that follows the classic tales of Cinderella, Little Red Riding Hood, Jack and the Beanstalk, and Rapunzel, all tied together by the couple from the tale of Rapunzel, here a baker and his wife, and their wish to begin a family tied up with the witch who has put a curse on them.—Anonymous
